title: Newsrooms will embrace some AI-generated imagery
description: In the last weeks of 2025, as I write this prediction, my social media feeds are awash with a new set of pronouncements about the death of photographic truth. As a historian of photography, I’m familiar with obituaries of this sort, which tend to circulate in popular media at moments when new photographic or image-editing...
